chant.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to repeat a word or phrase again and again
chant.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to sing or say a religious song or prayer in a way that involves using only one note or tone
chant.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: words or phrases that are repeated again and again by a group of people
chant.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Others in the crowd took up the chant  (=began chanting).
chants of ‘oh no, we won’t go’
chant.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a regularly repeated tune, often with many words sung on one note, especially used for religious prayers
